units.name: Ash, the Glacial Sorcerer
units.effect:
When you play a Water Spell – You can place an Ice Wall counter on target non-destroyed Tower you own. (Towers with Ice Wall counters get +500 defense. If a Tower is destroyed, remove all Ice Wall counters from that Tower.)
Remove all Ice Wall counters from all Towers you own: Deal damage to target Unit equal to the number of counters removed x500.

units.name: Ash, Tidemelder Squire
units.effect:
Your Fire and Water spells cost (1) less to play while your opponent has three or more destroyed towers.
Once per turn, expel a Fire card and Water card from your discard zone: Deal 1500 to target unit, and if you do, draw a card.

units.name: Citra, Aspirant Rose Knight
units.effect:
Discard this card and a Gear from your hand: Search your deck for "Order of the Rose" and add it to your hand.
Arrive - If a unit was sent from your field to the discard zone this turn, you may search your deck for a Rose Knight unit with cost (2) or less, except "Citra, Aspirant Rose Knight" and put it into play.

units.name: Daylon, the Conjurer's Raven
units.effect:
Arrive – If your champion is "Hoenna, the Immoral Conjurer", choose one.
* Put three counters on your champion.
* Remove all counters from your champion, then search your deck for a non-legendary unit with cost equal or less than the number of counters you removed this way and put it into play.
units.special: This card is based on former Baltimore Ravens player Daylon Mack!

units.name: Demi-Bahamute
units.effect:
Destroyer
Arrive - You may reveal two Dragon units from your hand: Destroy any number of units your opponent controls with combined power 2000 or less. For each unit destroyed this way, you may search your deck for a Dragon unit with cost (1) and put it into play.

units.name: Demi-Leviathan
units.effect:
Guardian
Arrive - You may flip any number of your face-down towers face-up. If you do, take control of any number of target units whose combined cost is equal to or less than the number of towers you flipped up.

units.name: Demonic Spy
units.effect: Arrive – Flip target face-down tower your opponent controls face-up.

units.name: Demon of the Evil Eye
units.faq: FAQ: You will declare a card name at resolution of this Arrive, not on cast
units.effect: Arrive – Declare a card name, then your opponent reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name. Draw one card for each card discarded this way.

units.name: Enforcer of the Twisting Abyss
units.effect:
Whenever this card deals damage to an opponent's tower - Your opponent discards a card and you draw a card.
Whenever your opponent discards a card - You may add this card from your discard zone to your hand.

units.name: Forager of the Fallen Leaf
units.effect:
Units you control with power that is double or more their original power cannot be targeted by your opponent's spells or abilities.
Whenever a unit is put into play under your control - You may pay (X). If you do, put X +500 counters on that unit.

units.name: Fragment of Adoration
units.effect:
Ω (Place on one or more of your units.)
Once per turn, put a unit from under this card into the discard zone: If every card in your discard zone has a different name, you may search your deck for a non-Argent card and either add it to your hand or put it into play.

units.name: G.Z., Blazerusher Squire
units.effect:
Arrive – You may expel an Air card from your discard zone, and/or a Fire card from your hand. If you do, put an Explosion Counter on this card for each card expelled this way.
Remove an Explosion counter from a card you control: This card gains Quickness.
Remove two Explosion counters from cards you control: Destroy target tower you own and target tower your opponent owns.

units.name: G.Z. the Explosion Master
units.effect:
Arrive – Place an Explosion counter on target Tower you own.
Exhaust, remove an Explosion Counter from a Tower you own: If it's face-down, flip it face-up. Deal damage equal to double its defense to target Unit. Destroy that Tower.

units.name: Liyu, Avarice Reborn
units.effect: When this card is put into the discard zone from anywhere – You may sacrifice a Dark unit. If you do, put this card into play.

units.name: The Masked Nemesis
units.effect:
Arrive or whenever this card declares an attack - Place a counter on this card.
Ruined - If this card had at least two counters on it, your opponent discards a card. If it had at least three counters, you may put this card into play.

units.name: Nanatsu, Stormsurger Squire
units.effect:
Instacast
Once per turn, expel an Air card and a Water card from your discard zone: Exhaust target unit, and if you do, recover one of your shards. Use this only while your opponent has three or more destroyed towers.

units.name: Nanatsu, the Pure Shinobi
units.effect:
Arrive – For each destroyed Tower, place one counter on this card.
Exhaust, remove one counter from this card: Exhaust Target Unit.
Exhaust, remove four counters from this card: Destroy Target Unit and, if you do, switch up to two of your Shards to Active at the end of the turn.

units.name: Nori, the First Warlock
units.effect:
As an additional cost to play this card you may pay (X).
Arrive – If you paid this card's additional cost, draw X cards.
Whenever you play a Water spell – You may exhaust target unit.
units.special: This card is based on Nori Ayukawa, who won ASC I!

units.name: Ω Charger
units.effect: Arrive – Put target unit from your discard zone under target Ω unit you control.

units.name: Professor Damous, Outlandish Engineer
units.effect: Exhaust, sacrifice a unit: Trigger the Arrive ability of the sacrificed unit.

units.name: Rex, Child of Brilliance
units.effect: If you would use Shard Drain you may sacrifice this card instead of returning a shard to your shard deck.

units.name: Ruka, Pugilist of the Holy Flame
units.effect:
Arrive – If you control another Fire unit, this card gets +500 and gains Brawler.
Whenever this declares an attack on a unit – If your spirit is Fire, you may flip it face-up.

units.name: Ruka, the Dragonsoul Pugilist
units.effect:
While you control this card, this card is also treated as a Dragon unit.
This card gets +500 for each of your expelled Dragon units.
Arrive - You may expel a Fire unit from your hand. If you do, draw a card. If you expelled a Dragon unit, draw two cards instead.

units.name: Ruler of the Twisting Waters
units.effect: Arrive - Target a Water spell in your discard zone. This turn, you may play that card from your discard zone as if it were in your hand. Expel that card if you do.

units.name: Shard-Mecha Prime: King Warku
units.effect:
Unblockable
While you control "Underground Mech Base", you may play this card from your discard zone as if it was in your hand. If you do, expel this card when it leaves the field.
Arrive – You may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for an "Underground Mech Base" and put it into play, and if you do, you may also add a "Shard-Mecha" unit with cost (3) or less from your deck to your hand.

units.name: Silver King's Overseer
units.effect: Ruined - Search your deck for up to one "Silver King's Pawn" and put it into play. If your champion is "Metaial the Silver King" put two into play instead.

units.name: Striker of the Endless Sword
units.effect:
Arrive - You may discard a card, if you do, choose one.
* Exhaust target unit.
* Recover target unit.

units.name: Underlord of the Void Flame
units.effect:
As an additional cost to play this card you may sacrifice a Fire unit with cost (2) or more. If you do, this card costs (2) less to play.
If you paid the additional cost to play this card, this card gains Quickness.

units.name: Unger, the Conjurer's Adversary
units.effect:
Whenever a unit your opponent controls is put into the discard zone - You may put into play a Raven token (Unit/Dark/Beast/500).
Sacrifice two other units: Your opponent's champion loses all abilities this turn.
units.special: This card is based on Jesse Unger, who won ASC II!

units.name: Valtier, the Magical Marksman
units.effect: Exhaust, pay (2): Destroy target unit with cost (2) or less.

units.name: Woody, Loyal Pack Leader
units.effect:
Guardian, Target Attack
Arrive – Put into play a Hound token (Unit * Beast/Light/500) that has Guardian and "Sacrifice this card: Prevent the next damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn." If your spirit is "Buckeye, the Loyal", put two into play instead.
units.special: This card is based on one of Jim's real dogs!

units.name: Yuki, Brightveiler Squire
units.effect:
Target Attack
This card cannot be targeted by spells or abilities of cards with cost (2) or less.
Expel a Dark card and Light card from your discard zone, and reveal this card from your hand: Put this card from your hand into play, and if you do, exhaust target unit your opponent controls. Use only while your opponent has three or more destroyed towers.

units.name: Yuki, the Lightning Flash
units.faq: FAQ: If you draw this card off of a Tower of Water destruction, it CAN be put into play
units.effect:
Target Attack
If this card is in your hand, after one of your Towers is destroyed – Put this card into play.

units.name: Ceremonial Harpist
units.effect:
Guardian
This card cannot deal damage, and cannot be targeted by spells.
Ruined – Search your deck for a "Hallowed Harpist" and put it into play.

units.name: Dux, the Infamous Skyraider
units.effect:
Airship and Skyraider units cost you (1) less to play.
Arrive - Add target Airship or Skyraider unit from your discard zone to your hand.

units.name: Giga-Shardbeast
units.effect:
You can only play units.
Other "Shardbeast" units you control get +500.

units.name: Gigath, the King of the Gargoyles
units.effect:
This card costs (2) less to play for each card in your hand that exceeds the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
If you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, neither player can add to the queue in response to playing this card.
Other units you control gain Immortal during your turn.

units.name: Linda & Goblin, Dynamic Duo
units.effect:
Brawler
While you control a Beast unit, you may play this card from your discard zone as if it was in your hand.
Arrive – Put into play a Cat token (Unit/Beast/Light/1000) that has "Cannot be targeted by spells or abilities.".

units.name: Sandsea Hydra Scorpion
units.effect: Ruined – Search your deck for a Beast unit with cost (1) or less and put it into play.

units.name: Unrestrained Poltergeist
units.effect: Ruined – Send the top three cards of a player's deck to the discard zone, then a different player expels the top three cards of their deck.

spells.name: Abyssal Maw
spells.effect: Target unit gets -X000 this turn. (X equals the number of Dark units in your discard zone.)

spells.name: Brilliant Verdure
spells.effect:
If this is the second card you've played this turn, this card costs (1) less to play.
Look at the top four cards of your deck. You may add a unit and/or augment among them to your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

spells.name: Curse of the Witch Queen
spells.effect: Take control of up to two target exhausted units.

spells.name: Rippling Sword Slash
spells.effect: Exhaust target unit your opponent controls, and if you do, you may recover a unit you control with cost less than the exhausted unit.

spells.name: Twisting Premonition
spells.effect:
Instacast
Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into the discard zone. Draw a card.

spells.name: Void Flame Expulsion
spells.effect:
Instacast
Play only while you control a Fire unit. Neither player can add to the queue in response to this card. Expel target unit or augment, and if you do, it's owner draws a card.

augments.name: Ω Amulet
augments.effect:
Arrive – Draw a card.
Sacrifice this card: Champions lose all abilities this turn. Neither player can add to the queue in response to this ability.

augments.name: Ketsu, the Erratic Armor
augments.effect:
You can only control one "Ketsu, the Erratic Armor".
Equip to target Ω unit you control.
If the equipped unit would put a unit under it into the discard zone for an ability, you may sacrifice this card instead.
Whenever one of your Ω units attacks - You may equip this card from your discard zone to that unit.

champions.name: Greatest Gardener, Gregory
champions.effect: Exhaust, sacrifice a unit: Recover one of your shards.

champions.name: Kratin, Being of Strength
champions.effect: Exhaust, pay (2): Target attacking unit gets +1000 this turn.

champions.name: Master of the Cerulean Tower
champions.effect: Exhaust, pay (1): Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

spirits.name: Tux, the Emperor Spirit
spirits.effect:
When a unit you control destroys a tower - You may draw a card then discard a card.
Soulburst, pay (3): Stun all units your opponent controls. (A Stunned card cannot attack, block, or use activated abilities, until the end of the next turn.)

spirits.name: Buckeye, the Loyal
spirits.effect:
You start the game with a Hound unit token with Guardian (Unit * Hound/Light/500). This token cannot attack, and has "Sacrifice this unit: Prevent the next damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn."
Soulburst: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.
spirits.special: This card is based on one of Jim's real dogs!

spirits.name: Dubell, Spirit of Gains
spirits.effect:
Exhaust, pay (1): Target attacking unit gets +500 this turn.
Soulburst: Target unit gets +1000 this turn.

spirits.name: Chewallo, Spirit of Seeds
spirits.effect:
Exhaust, pay (1): Look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck.
Soulburst: Recover one of your shards.

spirits.name: Welink, Spirit of Paper
spirits.effect:
Exhaust, pay (1): Put the bottom card of your deck on top of your deck.
Soulburst: Draw a card.

towers.name: Tower of Embers
towers.effect: When this tower is destroyed, you may deal 1500 to a unit, then you may deal 1000 to a unit.

towers.name: Tower of Waves
towers.effect: When this tower is destroyed, you may draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

towers.name: Tower of Gusts
towers.effect: When this tower is destroyed, you may recover all shards you control.

towers.name: Tower of Glimmers
towers.effect: When this tower is destroyed, you may exhaust all units your opponent controls.

towers.name: Tower of Fear
towers.effect: When this tower is destroyed, you may exhaust two of your opponent's shards.
